items.title: Drop Box Camera Catches Ballot Stuffing In Fraud-Plagued Michigan Town
items.description: Ballot dumps are suspicious. Election law requires ballots be dropped off by the voter, a member of the voter’s family, the voter's household

items.title: The Media’s Ukraine-Wins Fantasy Continues Costing Lives
items.description: Ukrainians may not like the reality of their situation either, but they can't afford to live the same fantasy the media keep trying for.

items.title: Covid Lockdowns Gave The Next Generation The Worst Personalities Ever
items.description: The Financial Times analyzed data on personality characteristics and the results are grim, especially among the young.
